desc: Unique Mobility have showrooms in Plymouth and Launceston and we cover the whole of Devon and Cornwall for products such as Mobility Scooters, Powered Wheelchairs, Vehicle Adaptations, Stairlifts, Riser Recliner Chairs, Adjustable beds, Rehabilitation equipment and more.

layout.text: Approved Used Winter Sale Now On
We have a large selection of used scooters and powerchairs in our winter sale
